ai-mil7.4.1:1.1_0: “Venerable Sister, what are the five factors should be called by one who belongs to?”
ai-mil7.4.1:1.2_0: “As a brick house, great king, intelligent, decorated earth, adorned with elephants, adorned with golden statue, and pearls and chopping buckets, elephants, horses, buffaloes, bulls, cos, goats, rugs, and so on.
ai-mil7.4.1:1.3_0: In the same way, a meditator with gaining material possessions. ...”
ai-mil7.4.1:1.4_0: This is the first thing, great king, we should go.
ai-mil7.4.1:2.1_0: Furthermore, great king, the earth is shaven, destroyed, and have gone to his own perfume.
ai-mil7.4.1:2.2_0: In the same way, the meditator with his own hands to bedrooms, wandering through the sea he should be able to get all there.
ai-mil7.4.1:3.1_0: Furthermore, the earth is shattering on the earth, outside the gateway, wisely ran out.
ai-mil7.4.1:3.2_0: In the same way, great king, when you’re shaved off your hair and beard, dressed in ocher robes, and went on top of the ascetic life.
ai-mil7.4.1:3.3_0: This is the third way to get hold of the Ganges.
ai-mil7.4.1:4.1_0: Furthermore, great king, a town hall built for people in town, at the foot of a tree in a lotus pond, or a bird crowded with people. It was not covered with white clothes, lotuses, and embankments.
ai-mil7.4.1:4.2_0: In the same way, a meditator with a Dhamma talk that is liked that educated, encouraged, fired up, and inspires confidence in people with a Dhamma talk, and inspire, he should be encouraged, fire up, and inspire topic.
ai-mil7.4.1:5.1_0: Furthermore, great king, the earth is devoted to the gods of the earth,
ai-mil7.4.1:5.2_0: In the same way, a meditator with a mind reinforced with those who go around the earth to ward off the shade of the earth.
ai-mil7.4.1:5.4_0: The laywoman named Cūḷapanthaka of the Sakyans,
ai-mil7.4.1:6.3_0: If I scented with my fragrance
ai-mil7.4.1:8.1_0: The first enquiry is the first thing.
